name: Deploy
description: Triggers when the card is played.

name: After
description: Triggers immediately after the resolution of any deploy ability.

name: Require
description: The card cannot be played unless the condition is met.

name: Activate
description: The active ability of the card. Unavailable on the first turn unless the card gains Haste.

name: Reactivate
description: Re-enable activation of the active ability.

name: Haste
description: The card can be activated on the turn it is played.

name: Equip
description: Triggers when the equipment is assigned to a unit.

name: Turnwise
description: Triggers while on the battlefield, each allied turn start.

name: Play
description: Move a card from hand to the battlefield, triggering its deploy ability.

name: Summon
description: Move a card to the battlefield, bypassing its deploy ability.

name: Resurrect
description: Play a card from graveyard and give it Doomed.

name: Tutor
description: Play a card from deck.

name: Destroy
description: Move a card from battlefield to graveyard.

name: Discard
description: Move a card from hand or deck to graveyard.

name: Mana
description: An elemental resource used to trigger abilities.

name: Expend X
description: Reroll X mana dice of the indicated type to trigger the ability.

name: Conjure X
description: Change any X mana dice to the indicated type.

name: Reroll
description: Reroll any number of common or allied mana dice.

name: Rally X
description: Add the indicated number of points to your score.

name: Rout X
description: Subtract the indicated number of points from your score.

name: Score
description: The running total of points gained from Rally or lost from Rout.

name: Boost X
description: Increase a unit's power by X.

name: Protect
description: Prevent a unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Protected
description: Triggers if the target unit is being protected by another unit.

name: Vulnerable
description: The card cannot receive protection.

name: Deflect
description: The targeted card no longer protects any units.

name: Assault X
description: Destroy an enemy unit of X or less power.

name: Assassinate X
description: Destroy an enemy unit of X or less power, bypassing Protection.

name: Banish
description: Remove a card from the game. Does not trigger Expire abilities.

name: Overkill X
description: Trigger this ability if an assault or assassinate ability exceeds the strength of the target unit by at least X.

name: Seize X
description: Move a unit of X or less power to it's opponents battlefield.

name: Armor X
description: Added to unit power when calculating vulnerability to Assault, Assassinate, and Seize abilities.

name: Expire
description: Triggers when the card is destroyed.

name: Finale
description: Triggers at the end of the round.

name: Disloyal
description: Indicates that the card is played to your opponent's battefield.

name: Chaos X
description: Triggers if there are at least X unique mana types.

name: Imbibe
description: Triggers when a Liquor card is equipped to the unit.

name: Bonded
description: Triggers if you control more than one copy of this card.

name: Echo
description: If this card is in your graveyard at the start of the round, move to the top of your deck and become Doomed before drawing cards.

name: Lock
description: Status that disables all of a card's abilities.

name: Poison
description: Status that marks a unit as poisoned, or destroy it if it is already poisoned.

name: Immune
description: Status that prevents the unit from receiving additional statuses.

name: Invisible
description: Status that prevents the unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Stalwart
description: Status that allows the unit to remain on the battlefield after the round ends.

name: Purify
description: Remove all statuses from a unit.
